taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a project with imported applications.

step.cmd: On the Package Explorer view pane, right-click on the folder where you want your new version.

step.stepresult: The Select a Wizard dialogue box is displayed.

step.cmd: Select New Screen and click on Next .
step.stepresult: The Create New Screen dialogue box is displayed.

step.cmd: Click on Browse button for selecting the application on which the version will be based.
step.info: This cannot be changed once the screen is created.

step.cmd: Enter a Screen Name in capital case.
step.info: Screen's name follows a naming convention of <application name><,><short name> where short name makes the screen's name unique. You should avoid any special character out of [A-Z]/[0-9] to avoid issues when saving the file or deploying to T24 environment.

taskbody.result: The new screen is created and opened in the editor.
